body_html:
@pjh5 Thanks, I could easily build with debug symbols using:

export PACKAGE_TYPE=manywheel
export DESIRED_PYTHON=3.6m
export DESIRED_CUDA=cu90
export PYTORCH_BUILD_VERSION=0.4.1
export DEBUG=1
export NIGHTLIES_EMAIL_LIST=''
export NIGHTLIES_FOLDER=$(mktemp -d)
./cron/build_docker.sh

The scripts are not really intented to do this (notifications and such) but it works. As @ezyang said, maybe all is needed is to make these build scripts a bit more accessible or documented.

body:
@pjh5 Thanks, I could easily build with debug symbols using:
```
export PACKAGE_TYPE=manywheel
export DESIRED_PYTHON=3.6m
export DESIRED_CUDA=cu90
export PYTORCH_BUILD_VERSION=0.4.1
export DEBUG=1
export NIGHTLIES_EMAIL_LIST=''
export NIGHTLIES_FOLDER=$(mktemp -d)
./cron/build_docker.sh
```
The scripts are not really intented to do this (notifications and such) but it  works. As @ezyang said, maybe all is needed is to make these build scripts a bit more accessible or documented.
